p: A total of 49 A(H7N9) patients from the first two epidemics had follow-up visits at three, six and 12 months after illness onset in five Chinese provinces (Shandong, Jiangxi, Hunan, Fujian, Zhejiang) and one municipality (Beijing). Three A(H7N9) patients in Jiangxi Province also were followed up at 64 months after onset. Twelve A(H7N9) patients from the fifth epidemic were followed up at 18 months after illness onset in Jiangxi Province during July to September 2018 (Figure S2, Supplementary materials). Medical follow-up physical examinations were conducted in 23 tertiary hospitals.
